projects.title: Ganjoorjoor
projects.description: A modern platform for exploring Persian poetry with AI-powered search and analysis. Making classical literature more accessible through technology.
projects.intuition: Growing up with Persian poetry, I always struggled to find specific verses or themes across different poets. I wanted to create a tool that could understand the nuance and beauty of Persian literature while making it searchable and discoverable for modern audiences.

projects.title: Smart Recipe Assistant
projects.description: An AI-powered cooking companion that suggests recipes based on available ingredients, dietary restrictions, and cooking skill level. Perfect for my Italian cooking adventures!
projects.intuition: I constantly find myself staring at my fridge wondering what to cook with random ingredients. As someone who loves Italian cooking but sometimes lacks inspiration, I thought: why not build an AI sous chef that can be creative with whatever I have on hand?

projects.title: Toronto Bike Routes Optimizer
projects.description: A route planning tool specifically designed for Toronto cyclists, considering bike lanes, elevation, weather, and real-time traffic data to suggest optimal cycling routes.
projects.intuition: After countless bike rides through Toronto where I ended up on busy streets or hit unexpected hills, I realized existing apps don't really understand the cyclist's perspective in this city. I wanted something that prioritizes safety and enjoyment over just speed.

projects.title: AI Code Review Assistant
projects.description: A tool that provides intelligent code reviews, suggests improvements, and helps maintain coding standards across different programming languages. Combines static analysis with machine learning insights.
projects.intuition: During code reviews at work, I noticed we spend a lot of time catching the same types of issues repeatedly. I wondered if AI could handle the routine stuff so we could focus on architecture and logic discussions instead of formatting and basic best practices.
roadmap: Train ML models on code quality metrics
